articles.title: US Says It’s Weighing Google Breakup as Monopoly Case Remedy - Bloomberg
articles.description: The US Justice Department is considering asking a federal judge to force Google to sell off parts of its business in what would be a historic breakup of one of the world’s biggest tech companies.
